deck_info.name: AI Prompt Engineering - Ethereal Deity Analysis
deck_info.description: 学习卡片集：基于 Ethereal Cyber-Deity 提示词提取的高价值技巧

front.question: 如何营造戏剧化的色彩对比？

back.answer: Cold-Warm Color Opposition (冷暖色彩对立)
back.structure: {subject}, Color Palette: {body zone} = {cool colors}, {focal object} = {warm colors}, Lighting from {focal object}
back.example: Entity, Color: Body=cyan/teal/white, Cube=pink/amber/purple, Lighting from cube
key_points: 冷色环境 → 营造距离感、神秘感
暖色焦点 → 吸引注意力、制造对比
光源来自焦点 → 增强戏剧性
色温对立 = 最大视觉张力
application_scenarios: 人像摄影（冷环境+暖光源）
产品摄影（冷背景+暖产品）

practice.exercise: 试着用这个技巧创作一个'冰雪女王'主题的提示词
practice.reference_answer: Ice queen in frozen throne room, Color: Environment=glacial blue/arctic white/frozen teal, Crown gem=molten amber/fire opal, Lighting from crown gem illuminating face with warm glow

front.question: 如何为半透明材质添加次表面散射效果？
front.hint: 需要考虑材质、光源位置、相机参数

back.structure: {subject with translucent material}, {camera angle} shot, {light source} causing subsurface scattering through {body part}, {lens}mm Macro, f/{aperture}
back.example: Fibrous entity, high-angle close-up, cube light causing SSS through fingers, 105mm Macro, f/1.8
key_points: SSS 触发关键词: translucent, subsurface scattering, light passing through
必要条件: 半透明材质 + 明确光源位置 + 指定穿透部位
参数配置: 微距镜头 (105mm) + 浅景深 (f/1.8) + 高分辨率 (8K)
AI 生成难点: 需要多次强调 strong SSS, clearly visible

practice.exercise: 创作一个'玉石挂件'的提示词，要求包含 SSS 效果
practice.reference_answer: Jade pendant, translucent nephrite, warm LED backlight causing subsurface scattering through carved patterns, 105mm Macro, f/2.8, soft glow, 8K

front.question: 如何构建有景深层次的画面？
front.hint: 思考前景、中景、背景的清晰度分配

back.answer: Three-Layer Depth Composition (三层景深构图)
back.structure: Foreground: {primary focus} (sharp focus), Midground: {secondary element}, Background: {environment} (bokeh blur), Shot on {lens}mm, f/{aperture}
back.example: Foreground: Cupped hands + cube (sharp), Midground: Face + visor, Background: Cosmic void (bokeh), 105mm, f/1.8
key_points: 景深控制 = 故事讲述: 清晰前景 → 主要信息；虚化背景 → 环境氛围
层次分配: 前景30%最锐利 + 中景40%连接 + 背景30%虚化
光圈与景深: f/1.4-f/2极浅 | f/4-f/5.6中等 | f/11+深景深
Bokeh 美化: soft bokeh, circular bokeh, dreamy blur
application_scenarios: 所有需要景深层次的摄影/渲染场景

practice.exercise: 用这个结构创作一个'咖啡店场景'提示词
practice.reference_answer: Foreground: Steaming coffee cup on table (sharp focus), Midground: Customer reading book, Background: Blurred cafe interior with bokeh window lights, Shot on 50mm, f/2.0

front.question: 如何创造电影级的戏剧打光？
front.hint: 考虑场景内物体作为光源

back.structure: {character} {holding gesture} {glowing object}, lighting from {object} illuminating {target area} from below, creating {mood} atmosphere
back.example: Deity cupping cube, lighting from cube illuminating face from below, creating reverent atmosphere
key_points: 剧情内光源 (场景物体发光) vs 外部光源 (摄影棚灯) → 真实感更强
底光情绪: 向上照射 → 神秘/不祥/戏剧化；向下照射 → 自然/日常
强化技巧: volumetric lighting (可见光束) + rim lighting (边缘光)
常见应用: 魔法物品、火把、全息屏幕、LED

practice.exercise: 创作一个'读魔法书的法师'场景，书本发光
practice.reference_answer: Wizard reading ancient tome, glowing runes on pages, lighting from book illuminating weathered face from below, casting dramatic shadows, volumetric light rays, mysterious atmosphere
